About the Locations

Here you'll find the locations of all EUPA fields used for various sporting events. Each point on the map represents a field with details available by clicking on the markers.

About Us

We are a nonprofit organization promoting frisbee sports in Edmonton. Everyone is welcome to join and participate in our events and activities.
